QueryResult.text: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN frequency = 1 THEN expiration_date - 7 WHEN frequency = 3 THEN ADD_MONTHS(expiration_date,-1) ELSE expiration_date END) ROLLOVER_DATE FROM prj_blb_slicerequests WHERE is_dwh_request = 1 AND request_name IN ('WEEKLYRESOURCEACTCURVE', 'MONTHLYRESOURCEACTCURVE', 'WEEKLYRESOURCEESTCURVE', 'MONTHLYRESOURCEESTCURVE', 'assignment::actcost_curve::dwh_week', 'assignment::actcost_curve::dwh_month', 'assignment::estcost_curve::dwh_week', 'assignment::estcost_curve::dwh_month', 'WEEKLYRESOURCEBASECURVE', 'MONTHLYRESOURCEBASECURVE', 'WEEKLYBASEASSIGNCOSTS', 'MONTHLYBASEASSIGNCOSTS')
